# Install and Load lens2r

```{r setup}
library(lens2r)
```

# Add Lens.org API token to .Renviron

```{r add token, eval=FALSE, include=FALSE}
lens2r::add_token()
```

# Get Scholarly Data


```{r eval=FALSE, include=FALSE}
lens2r::get_scholarly_data()
```

# Get Collection Data

```{r eval=FALSE, include=FALSE}
lens2r::get_collection()



```
